about_the_game:
Welcome to Finnish Cottage 8, a classic summer cottage in the woods so peaceful you’d never want to leave!

Finnish Cottage 8 is a walking simulator set in a mökki (summer cottage), a beloved staple of Finnish summer life. Equipped with an obligatory sauna and a classic Finnish weather forecast radio program, this game will transport you to the tranquility of summer in the Land of A Thousand Lakes.

But in this cottage, something sinister stirs where your eyes don't reach. 

Observe carefully and you may find your way out. 

How to play

The bad news is, you are not the first to attempt an escape...

The good news is, you are not the first to attempt an escape!

A secret organisation has been investigating this cottage, and their efforts left behind certain convenient tools. This laptop will help you identify which loop you are in.

If you see an anomaly, leave through the back door (marked with "Anomalies" tape).

If you don’t see an anomaly, leave through the front door.

If you are right, the loop number goes up by 1.

If you are wrong, you’ll return to Loop 0.

Once the number reaches 8, the cottage may let you go....

Average Play time

30 - 60 minutes

Languages

The game includes audio in English and Finnish, but understanding of the latter is not required for playing the game.

Subtitles are available in English and Finnish.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of blood, aftermath of violent acts, an instance of severed body part, implied death without graphical depiction.
